branchCategory.name: NC(D)A1K, NFPA, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Non-rotating
branchCategory.description: <p>NCA1 non-rotating single rod, double acting, medium duty NFPA interchangeable cylinders. The NCA1 is standard with air cushion, pre-lubricated and available in 11 mounting styles. Bore sizes range from 1.5 to 4 inches. </p>

breadCrumb.name: NC(D)A1K, NFPA, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Non-rotating
